title: 223. Should Kids Pay Back Their Parents for Raising Them?
description: When one athlete turned pro, his mom asked him for $1 million. Our modern sensibilities tell us she doesn't have a case. But should she?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
